values: Oh my. Peony, um...I think we have a pet. I-it's so cute. It keeps saying 'piplup'. Is that what I should call it? [[ ooc: Couldn't resist. XD ]]
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/4518.html

Seems as though I've missed some...interesting experiences in the past few days.  How is everyone faring?  <s>I've hardly left this bed since coming to the Upper Level...I had forgotten what a real bed felt like.</s>

<small>[[ Sorry I've been so inactive sjkdhgsas holidays KILLED ME D: ]]</small>
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/4123.html

[[ Voice Post: Activated ]] P-Peony! Medea...she told me that Jade-- ...Before he left, Jade asked for us to be moved to the Upper Level-! And Professor...P-Professor Nebilim is here, and... Aah...*deep breath, obviously trying to calm herself, then spoken almost under her breath* This is all too much at once...! *pause, then she sounds much more composed* I'm sorry, I was a little out of sorts for a moment. We should try to make sure that she's as comfortable as possible, don't you think? Come home soon. [[ /Voice Post ]]
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/4054.html

Now this...this I know.  Aha, to think I'd get nostalgic for something as constant as snow was in Keterburg...

Peony, Saphir, we should try to find more blankets.  It's going to start getting rather cold, I imagine.
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/3811.html

It seems as though holes are opening up all around...I wonder where they lead-- ...my goodness. Is that...a dragon outside?! It's...beautiful. Peony has proposed to me. I'm...truly happy, more so than I can say. After everything, for him to be so loyal to me...I can hardly understand it. Still...who am I to question my own good fortune? Perhaps there's some good in this place after all. I wonder how Jade will react...hm...
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/3583.html

Peony seems to be keeping something from me.  He's excited about it, whatever it is.  <s>He knows better than to leave me wondering~</s>

And, as I've grown somewhat weary of unemployment...is there anyone that could use my services?  I'm quite versatile, though my strengths are in public relations and sciences.  ...That's an odd combination, I know.  Thank you, in advance.

<lj-cut text="Private to Jade // Unhackable">

I've...not heard from you since your accident.  Are you all right?

</lj-cut>
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/3139.html

[[ Screened to Luke // Voice Post // Unhackable ]] ...L-Luke. Where... Is he...is Jade okay? Where is he? His...communication was cut off, so...I just don't know. ...g-get back to me soon, okay? - [[ Injured Jade = scared Nephry. XD; ]]
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/2999.html

My, with all of the excitement around here, I have to say...I'm rather glad I didn't switch genders myself.  <s>Though...actually, I think I'd just look like Jade with lighter hair.</s>

If anyone needs any...gender-specific help, I'm more than willing to lend a hand.
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/2657.html

Ah...I'm almost completely healed now. Only a couple of sore spots. Thank you for all your help, Mathiu...really, I can't thank you enough. Jade, Peony, Saphir...thank you too. I don't know what I'd do without the three of you. [[ Private // Hackable only with a good deal of effort ]] Though my physical wounds have almost healed, I'm still... It's difficult for me to be this frightened. I have very little to defend myself, should that man try again to find me...or the one that worked for him, the cloaked one. ...I feel as though I've forgotten something terribly important. Something involving the five of us...it's a strange, incomplete feeling. Is this a side-effect of...dying, here? Did I lose a part of myself...? What a disturbing thought... [[ /Private ]] [[ ooc: Jumping ahead here...the thread where Mathiu comes to help her is still in progress. XD; ADDY GET YOUR ASS IN THAT THREAD. XDDDD First strike is still legible; should the entry be hacked, the second strike is only barely legible. XD; And the reason she says 'five of us' as opposed to 'four' is because she forgot Nebilim's death. :x ]]
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/2476.html
help me someo-- i'm hurt help edge of the city on the far side hurry-- [[ ooc: In correllation with this thread~ Answer if you'd like, but she won't be able to respond. XD; ]]
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/2152.html

This... Really, of all things to return to me... ...Thank you. [[ Private // Hackable only if you're really good ]] I feel...as though I'm being followed. It's extremely disconcerting. Especially with things spiraling down into mayhem here...I should get back to the shelter, as quickly as possible. It may not be much safer, but it's a little better than just being out in the open... [[ /Private ]] [[ ooc: The thing that was returned to her was the doll that she broke as a child, and Jade replicated for her. ^^; ]]
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/1995.html

[[ Private // Hackable if you're really good ]] I... What have we done? To give in to our sins so easily... And still I perpetuate this sin...still I love him, still I'm willing to throw away everything for him... It would be foolish to believe that the Gods didn't notice. I can...I can only pray that they will be merciful. If not...then I will take his punishment in addition to my own. I will gladly take responsibility for what has happened. Please. If there is only one request that I can make, please let it be that. I'm begging you. [[ /Private ]]
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/1745.html

Well...at the least, I can say that this place never exactly gets boring. I can't say I quite expected such an explosion. I do hope no one was hurt. [ Private // Hackable ] I'm growing somewhat restless. I want to learn more about that "upper world"...but how is that possible? Is it even conceivable to speak to these Gods...? To be honest, the thought unnerves me. But I see no other way to gain any knowledge on the subject. The 'library' is really only that in name - the books inside are either rotting apart or completely useless. Although...ha, I did bring back a book on basic sewing. Who knows when that could come in handy. I'm finding myself growing closer and closer to Peony again. The temptation to give into our sins is so strong, but...not only damning myself, I would be damning him by doing so, and...I just don't know what to do. [ /Private ] [[ ooc: Should the private portion be hacked, the strike is basically illegible. XD ]]
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/1324.html

We're beginning to run out of food... I've hardly left this building once, and to be honest, I'm becoming somewhat...claustrophobic. But I know all too well that I simply don't possess the ability to defend myself. ...Yet. Therefore, I'm going to make a request. I'd like someone to teach me some basic fighting skills. Just enough that I'll be able to keep the monsters wandering about from completely destroying me, heh... There isn't much that I can offer in return. I can only try to be helpful in some way. Claustrophobia is only the start, really. I'm...not used to having this much time spent not doing a thing, this much time to think. Six years Peony knew about the ultimatum his father gave to me...six years he saw me married to someone else, and longed for me still. He's here because of me. Because I didn't have the strength, all that time ago, to ask for help. I do belong here after all...
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/1222.html

I suppose it was wishful thinking to believe that I would awaken back in Keterburg...

Well.  Moping around isn't going to get me anywhere...I'll just have to make the best of this situation, dark as it is.  I should try to learn more about this place, to see what - if anything - I can do.  <s>I hope I can keep this optimism going.</s>

<lj-cut text="Private//Hackable">

I wonder how long I was asleep...and did Peony stay beside me the whole time?  He was there when I fell asleep, and there when I woke up again...that alone is an extraordinary comfort to me, but...

...I really can't let my emotions get the best of me.  I just...can't.  Not here, not under these circumstances.

<s>Though I wish I could feel more confident about that.</s>

</lj-cut>

<font size=1>[[ First strike is still legible, second is only if you try really hard. ]]</font>
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/906.html

It seems as though this isn't just a dream after all.

This is all a little hard to take in. Gods, sins, this city itself...

There must be others here.  <s>Jade, Peony, Saphir...I both hope that you're here, and desperately hope that you aren't.</s>
http://keterburg-queen.livejournal.com/621.html
